title: ClusterInformation

spec.description: ClusterInformationSpec contains the values of describing the cluster.

datastoreReady.description: DatastoreReady is used during significant datastore migrations to signal to components such as Felix that it should wait before accessing the datastore.

variant.description: Variant declares which variant of Calico should be active.
